The community is excellent and the bot support is outstanding. I was so impressed with the bots coming from CSGO that I was surprised they were made by the same developer. Its THE CS if you want to play singleplayer and its got plenty of custom content too.

kupil spustya 2 goda ot iri v demku zaebis

Игра просто легендарная!Подарила очень много эмоции ещё в детстве играю в пиратск версию и я даже не поленился купить лицензию.Огромное ей спасибо за все.Наиграл на лицензии 150 часов,а если посчитать и время потраченное в пиратской версии,то 100% выйдет больше 1500часов.Приятная атмосфера игры,добрые и весёлый мужики на пабликах,которые расскажут истории и научат играть.
Я рекомендую данную игру, даже не смотря что игра 2004 года она очень интересная и затягивающая.
MEH pretty mid , i think they're gonna make a new one called counter strike global offensive tho lol
This DLC for Garry's mod is good, it even came with a free game

honestly, ill call this a complete masterpiece to be honest this is the best Counter-Strike better than every counter strike game
it has object/ragdoll physics, and also very easy to mod and play
and i don't know whether its just me or this game is so fairly balanced and fun to play, like already in first time playing the game only 20 minutes then closing it i realize i now have 5 achievements, i dont know how it does it or how they balanced it but its amazing
the community is nice and respectable 
i love this game 10/10
It is decent game with decently active community, since it is required for Garry's mod online play I would recommend anyone who owns it to play it too.
